result.eng: It was said that he was well-off.
result.ga: Bhí iomrá go raibh sé ina sháith den tsaol
result.orig: Bhí iomrá go raibh sé ina sháith den tsaol
result.html: Bhí iomrá go raibh sé ina sháith den tsaolIt was said that he was well-off.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí iomrá go raiḃ sé ina ẛáiṫ den tsaolIt was said that he was well-off.

result.eng: All you need to care aboit in this world is to steal in a way the law allows.
result.ga: Is cuma duit ar an tsaol seo ach goid de réir dlí
result.orig: Is cuma duit ar an tsaol seo ach goid de réir dlí
result.html: Is cuma duit ar an tsaol seo ach goid de réir dlíAll you need to care aboit in this world is to steal in a way the law allows.
result.ponchtml: Is cuma duit ar an tsaol seo aċ goid de réir dlíAll you need to care aboit in this world is to steal in a way the law allows.

result.eng: I don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.
result.ga: Níl feidhm orm aon lá oibre a dhéanamh le mo sholas Tá mé i mo sháith den tsaol
result.orig: Níl feidhm orm aon lá oibre a dhéanamh le mo sholas Tá mé i mo sháith den tsaol
result.html: Níl feidhm orm aon lá oibre a dhéanamh le mo sholas Tá mé i mo sháith den tsaolI don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.
result.ponchtml: Níl feiḋm orm aon lá oibre a ḋéanaṁ le mo ẛolas Tá mé i mo ẛáiṫ den tsaolI don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.
